entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is being questioned by Snape. He is described as 'Cold with dread' and trying to keep his face impassive.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who is suspicious of Harry's actions. He is described as having 'long nostrils quivering'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who gave him the Zonko's tricks and Marauder's Map.

entities.name: zokno's bag
entities.description: Zonko's bag is a collection of tricks that Ron brought back from Hogsmeade. It is described as being picked up by Snape.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is an object that Harry pulled out of his pocket. It is described as being picked up by Snape and suspected to be a letter written in invisible ink.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a location where Ron brought back the Zonko's tricks from.

relationships.description: Snape picked up the Zonko's bag.
Harry pulled out the Marauder's Map from his pocket.
Ron gave the Zonko's tricks to Harry.
